Class ServerHandler

    • server.ServerHandler

    public class ServerHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This class initialise server and handles messages from the client

        Constructor
        Parameters:
        clientList - list of all clients connected to the server

        logger - logs error to the file and show error in the console if verbose is enabled
        verbose - show error in the console

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Override method which starts while a thread is created. This method will check if database is available, send handshake and then parse each command from the client.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • exit

        private void exit()
        Closing of the socket and removing the client from the list
